actions.text: Amendment SA 945 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 1. Record Vote Number: 230.
Amendment SA 945 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S8189-8198, S8200-8201) To ensure that there is competition in the pharmaceutical industry and increased access to affordable drugs.

purpose: To ensure that there is competition in the pharmaceutical industry and increased access to affordable drugs.
